name: To Unstable an Elephant
description:
Description:

"Someone has stabled elephants in my stables! Please unstable them immediately!"

You must remove as many elephants from the stables as possible. Do not remove horses.

How to play:

  • Controls: Use the arrow keys to run and jump.
  • Push elephants out of the screen (+1 point per elephant)
  • Don't push the horses out (-1 point per horse)
  • Don't fall off (-1 point per fall)

"unstable" (verb): (transitive) To release (an animal) from a stable. 

Jam game:

  • The game was made for Godot Wild Jam #49.
  • Jam theme: "UNSTABLE". 
  • Submitted within the initial deadline, without the extra week.

Credits:

  • The game: Sprellgi, using Godot
  • Graphics: visual assets are all from Kenney.nl (public domain)
    • RPG Base
    • Animal Pack Redux
    • Toon Characters 1
    • Top-down Tanks (smoke clouds)
  • Audio: all from freesound.org and licensed CC-0
    • Background music (ADnova)
    • Jump sound (qubodup)
    • Whoosh sound (qubodup)
  • Font: Ultra (Astigmatic)
